palmos

Class NetLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • palmos.NetLib

  • public class NetLib
extends java.lang.Object
    Defined structures and constants needed to use the Palm NetLibrary

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NetLib.NetSocketAddrEnum
      Defined the various types of sockets address.
      static class  NetLib.NetSocketDirEnum 
      static class  NetLib.NetSocketOptEnum
      Option constants that can be passed to NetSocketOptionSet and NetSocketOptionGet When an option is set or retrieved, both the level of the option and the option number must be specified.
      static class  NetLib.NetSocketOptLevelEnum
      Option levels for SocketOptionSet and SocketOptionGet
      static class  NetLib.NetSocketProtocolEnum
      Network Protocols supported
      static class  NetLib.NetSocketTypeEnum
      Types of sockets
